fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: background_color
fields.instructions: When not using a background image, a background color will be used.

fields.label: Jump to other category pages from archive
fields.name: jump_to
fields.instructions: When this option is checked, the archive page will include a select list of other categories. Unchecking this option will also remove this option from that select list for other archive pages.

fields.label: External URL
fields.name: external_url
fields.instructions: You can link a post to an external one. Enter the URL here and it must start with https://

choices.none: None (you can add the image yourself)

fields.label: Alternate featured image
fields.name: alt_featured_image
fields.instructions: If added, this alternate image will show on the post page. The featured image will still appear in other blocks and archives.

fields.label: Show a page menu?
fields.name: show_page_menu
fields.message: Adds a sidebar menu to navigate within this page.

fields.label: Custom section menu?
fields.name: custom_section_menu
fields.message: Changes which section menu appears between the site header and page title.

fields.label: Choose a section menu
fields.name: choose_section_menu
fields.instructions: Choose another page whose section menu this page should show.

fields.label: Transparent header
fields.name: transparent
fields.instructions: With this option on, the featured image or top cover image block will slide behind the site header.

fields.label: Top shadow
fields.name: top_shadow
fields.instructions: This option controls the shadow that appears at the top of the hero image to give the site header more contrast. If the hero image is dark, a top shadow might not be necessary.

fields.label: Bottom shadow
fields.name: bottom_shadow
fields.instructions: This option controls the shadow that appears at the bottom of the hero image to give the page title and description more contrast. If the hero image is dark or there is no description below the title, a bottom shadow might not be necessary.

fields.label: Hide page title
fields.name: hide_page_title
fields.instructions: Use this option to suppress the standard page title, for example when you want to add a custom header.

fields.label: Related articles (posts)
fields.name: related_articles
fields.instructions: This field lets you choose articles instead of showing the most recent articles in the same category.
